  redirect: 'manual' // é˜»æ­¢ fetch è‡ªåŠ¨é‡å®šå‘
})
.then(response => {
  if (response.status === 302) {
    const location = response.headers.get('Location'); // è·å–é‡å®šå‘ç›®æ ‡

.catch(error => {
